alert.note: Alert for Bamberg; Barnwell (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 24 at 3:26PM EDT by NWS Columbia
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of eastern Barnwell and northwestern Bamberg Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 325 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Barnwell. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Barnwell, Denmark, Blackville, Barnwell State Park, Hilda, Olar, Elko, Govan and Barnwell County Airport. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
